value.title: Data users demand simple actionable insights quickly
value.excerpt: Big data, cloud computing, and analytics bring tremendous power. To share that, we must provide simple, impactful insights to data users.

value.title: Amazon fixes security flaw in AWS Glue service
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services fixes a flaw that could give an attacker access to data of other users on its Glue managed data integration service.

value.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Accelerates Manufacturing Homegrown Chips

value.title: Top programming languages: This coding favourite just topped the list again
